statements: SELECT * FROM women_rights_conventions;
SELECT convention_name, country FROM women_rights_conventions WHERE implementation_status = TRUE;
SELECT country, signing_date FROM women_rights_conventions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM women_rights_conventions ORDER BY signing_date DESC;
SELECT convention_name, signing_date FROM women_rights_conventions WHERE country = 'Germany' AND implementation_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM women_rights_conventions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT convention_name, country FROM women_rights_conventions WHERE implementation_status = TRUE ORDER BY signing_date DESC;
SELECT country, COUNT(*) AS total_conventions FROM women_rights_conventions GROUP BY country HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT convention_name, country, signing_date FROM women_rights_conventions WHERE signing_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY signing_date;
SELECT * FROM women_rights_conventions ORDER BY country, signing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Conventions;
SELECT convention_name, country FROM Conventions WHERE ratification_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT convention_id, convention_name, ratification_date FROM Conventions ORDER BY ratification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TreatyStatus WHERE ratification_status = 'Signed' AND ratification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_conventions FROM Conventions WHERE country LIKE 'U%';
SELECT * FROM Conventions WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY convention_name DESC;
SELECT convention_id, convention_name, ratification_date FROM Conventions WHERE ratification_date < '2020-01-01' AND country='France';
SELECT convention_name, ratification_status FROM Conventions JOIN TreatyStatus ON Conventions.convention_id = TreatyStatus.treaty_id WHERE signatory_country='Germany';
SELECT COUNT(convention_id) AS total_conventions, country FROM Conventions GROUP BY country HAVING COUNT(convention_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_conventions DESC;
SELECT MAX(ratification_date) AS latest_ratification_date, MIN(ratification_date) AS earliest_ratification_date FROM Conventions;
SELECT * FROM International_Conventions;
SELECT title, country, date_signed FROM International_Conventions WHERE country='USA';
SELECT title, country, date_signed FROM International_Conventions WHERE date_signed > '2000-01-01';
SELECT title, country, language FROM International_Conventions ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT * FROM Treaty_Detail WHERE article_number < 5;
SELECT * FROM International_Conventions;
SELECT title, country, date_signed FROM International_Conventions WHERE country = 'Germany';
SELECT title, language FROM International_Conventions WHERE language IS NOT NULL;
SELECT title, date_ratified, language FROM International_Conventions WHERE date_ratified > '2020-01-01';
SELECT treaty_id, ratification_status, notes FROM Treaty_Status WHERE ratification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM conventions;
SELECT name, description FROM conventions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM treaties WHERE signing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, signatory_country FROM treaties ORDER BY ratification_date DESC;
SELECT violation_description FROM violations WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM conventions ORDER BY ratification_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, signatory_country, COUNT(title) AS total_treaties FROM treaties GROUP BY title, signatory_country HAVING COUNT(title) > 1;
SELECT v.violation_description, v.violation_date, a.content FROM violations v JOIN articles a ON v.article_id = a.id WHERE v.violation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT name, description, country FROM conventions WHERE country IN ('USA', 'Canada', 'Mexico') ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT c.name, t.title, a.article_number FROM conventions c JOIN treaties t ON c.id = t.convention_id JOIN articles a ON t.id = a.treaty_id WHERE a.article_number = 5;
SELECT * FROM countries;
SELECT name, id FROM conventions WHERE year > 2000;
SELECT content, title FROM articles ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM countries WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM ratifications WHERE date_ratified >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM countries;
SELECT name, id FROM countries ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, year FROM conventions WHERE year > 2000;
SELECT articles.title, countries.name FROM articles JOIN countries ON articles.id = countries.id;
SELECT conventions.name AS convention_name, countries.name AS country_name FROM conventions JOIN countries ON conventions.country_id = countries.id;
